publishedfiledetails.title: Peachy Worktables
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]Description[/h1]
This mod was created for Medieval RolePlayers (RP) who want a workshop that is less modern. All items can be picked up (accept the grinder) and do not require foundations to place, as well modern sounds/power have been removed.

Please take the time to give the mod a thumbs up and rate it. 
[img=https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

If you like the look of this mod make sure to Rate and Favorite it and Check out my other mods:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1491573333] Peachy Furniture [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1517403145] Peachy Decor [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1587890586] Peachy Viking Decor [/url]

[b] Mod ID 1482267887[/b]

Spawn codes and Engram list can be found in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/discussions/1482267887] Discussion Tab [/url]

[h1]Peachy Worktable[/h1] You need this item to craft all other Peachy Worktable items

[h1]Worktables:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Peachy Chem Table - No fuel required but you do need to turn it off and one (Added Laundry Soap)
[*]Peachy Cooker - Sparkpowder needed to start. No water required to write a  drink recipe but to make drinks you do need a jar of water.
[*]Peachy Fab - Sparkpowder to start 
[*]Peachy Grinder - Sparkpowder to start (CANNOT BE PICKED UP)
[*]Peachy Smithy
[*]Peachy Cheese Table - Craft Cheese Decor and Yummy Cheese Slice Treats
[/list]
 [h1]Peachy Tables:[/h1]
[list]
All tables can stacked on top of each other and items can be placed on them.
[*]Large
[*]Med
[*]Small
[*]Large with back - Has storage
[*]Med with back - Has storage
[*]Small with back - Has storage
[*]Corner Left - Has storage
[*]Corner Right - Has storage
[/list]
 [h1]Misc:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Peachy Oven - Cooks raw meat
[*]Peachy Compost - Makes fertilizer
[*]Peachy Beer - No water required - Take 6mins on Multi 1 min Single Player
[*]Peachy Preserving Jar 
[*]Peachy Preserving Bin - Can be placed on or under Peachy Tables
[*]Peachy Trough
[*]Peachy Fridge - Requires no fuel
[*]Peachy Forge - Sparkpowder to Fuel 
[*]Peachy Well - Instantly fills up water containers
[*]Peachy Water Jug - Instantly fills up water containers
[*]Peachy Barrel Med and Small - Storage
[/list]
